title: Exploding (brand)
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|It will explode into fragments upon hitting a target, hitting an obstruction, or reaching its maximum range.}}

'''Exploding''' is an [[ammunition]] [[brand]] found solely on [[tomahawk]]s. Throwing an exploding item at a target creates an unavoidable 3x3 explosion that deals 2d5 physical damage to the target and everything adjacent to it. Explosive ammo always [[mulch]]es when thrown.

==Strategy==
Exploding tomahawks are useful for taking out evasive, fragile opponents and enemy summoners hiding behind their summons. However, be aware that the explosions they produce are loud enough to attract a lot of attention. They are also quite rare outside of the [[Orcish Mines]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.24]], this ammunition brand could be found on [[tomahawk]]s. Also, there was a rare ammunition shop that had exploding [[large rock]]s and [[javelin]]s.
*Prior to [[0.18]], exploding could generate on [[sling bullet]]s.
*In [[0.17]], exploding tomahawks were added.
*Prior to [[0.15]], exploding [[dart]]s were common.
